title: Why Soraka needs another rework.
body: Just go watch the Regional qualifiers between C9 and TiP.  That's all you need to see, there are SOOOOOO many instances where Soraka saves someones life and if any other champion had been that support they would've died.  And Riot WTF were you thinking with a GLOBAL HEAL?!?!?!?!  Like really, not only does she make any poke completely irrelevant but being able to do it globally!??!?!?!?  You've fucked up pretty hard in 5.16 Riot, but seeing that Soraka is still as BS as she always has been is just unforgivable.  You're clearly trying to kill off your player base Via stress, stop it.  Test champion releases and reworks before you send them out into the real game and LISTEN TO THE PBE FEEDBACK; you'd get far less comments like this.

replies.body: Soraka cannot heal herself anymore if a team focuses raka she dies almost instantly she is not that good at kiting. She needs a ton of pots in lane. Her entire job is to save lives. Logically she is a very balanced champion the other team could obviously not take advantage of her weaknesses.

Thresh dominates support plays for years, no problem. 
Soraka does good for two games "OMG NERF NERF NERF!!!!"

The only reason he's dominated is because he brings utility, and requires relatively high mechanics to pull off combos effectively.  On the other hand Soraka's an AFK heal bot that has one of the very few silences left, and pretty meaty heal and a global heal/buff.  I don't think if something is hard to pull off it should be denied a good reward, but when something is so incredibly easy it shouldn't be as rewarding as the harder of the two tasks.

Same, man. That's why I only really play Lulu/Leo/Thresh/Annie 'support' anymore. :P

Soraka saving people? Gasp. It's like that's her thing.

You know how many instant stuns and knockbacks she has? None.
Are they that necessary when she can silence the enemy support and prevent them from using their Knockbacks and stuns.
Can she walk out of their knockback and stun so she can silence them?

Most supports don't have the 925 cast range that Soraka does on her silence, interesting how she's designed that way isn't it?  Longer than the cast on Ali W, if you're a decent laner you'll dodge thresh hook, the only one I can think of off the top of my head is Janna Q.  Feel free to look at all the supports though, I don't all of the cast ranges off the top of my head.

It has a longer range because *you can walk out of it.* Comparing it to Ali's point-and-click W, however, is just plain unfair for the cow.

Yes, you can dodge a Thresh hook. But you can't walk out of it once he does, it has a slight cc duration unlike Blitz's hook, then he can jump on you and throw out his ult or use his close-range E. Apples and oranges, they are two different champions.

Just like other supports, Soraka has her strengths, but she is definitely not without her counterplay. Just because she got played in the LCS doesn't mean she should immediately need nerfing.

I'm not saying that she has no counter play, I'm saying counter playing her is more difficult than I personally think it should be.  You shouldn't need to outrange something to counter play it, granted hard engage destroys her but that's not always an option.

Dude, you don't have to outrange her.

There are two forms of counterplay to her aoe silence: divide and conquer so she can't hit multiple people at once during ganks or just not getting too close during a teamfight, and *walking out of it.* All the silence does is not allow you to cast spells. If you're an ADC, all you have to do is be in aa range. If you're a mage, you can walk out of the field. Soraka is not going to 100-0 you. It's not like a Thresh hook or a Leona stun. It has more range, but it doesn't have as much power.
And it doesn't require outranging her but it makes it easier to take her out of the equation.
Bard, Braum, Janna, Karma, Lulu, Nami, Sona, Tahm Kench, and Zilean would have saved them just as well.

C9 pulling a reverse sweep after banning Soraka means extremely little, Soraka's niche is healing people, basically exactly what you're complaining about. 

She has no hard CC, no means of engage or disengage, she literally has nothing but the capability to heal, take that away and what exactly does she bring to the table? I can answer that, nothing. Her AoE snare can be dodge literally by walking out of it. And if you're an ADC, chances are, being silenced means incredibly little to you. 

Oh and she kills herself, literally for healing other people on her team.
